texts.biography: Waerjak was raised without a tribe and without a family, wandering the land with his foster father - Tarnum. But he never forgot his Barbarian blood. This intelligent and worldly young man now hopes to one day reclaim the long-forgotten glory and honor of his people.
texts.name: Waerjak

specialty.description: All units in Waerjak's army are enchanted with Expert Slayer.
specialty.name: Slayer
